alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 3:02PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, locally up to 3 feet near Brian Head, in the Pine Valleys and Tushar Ranges. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is increased avalanche danger with this storm. Check the avalanche forecast at utahavalanchecenter.org prior to heading to the backcountry through at least Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
